doc.field: residential facilities: University of Virginia GIS (Datastack) Datasets

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library’s Scholars’ Lab by the Infotech Enterprises, and is provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. It pertains primarily to the infrastructure and land use at the University of Virginia as well as related natural features. * // * The temporal extent of the datasets is 2006. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): *
* Polygon features of buildings under construction * Bridges * Bushes * Ditches * Driveways * Fences * Grasses * Guard rails * Miscellaneous polygons (amphitheater, old Lambeth athletic field) * Mobile homes * Pad (hard surfaces like concrete slabs) * Parking lots * Parking features under construction as of Spring 2006 * Ponds * Residential facilities (residential facilities, includes residential locations off University property, such as Jefferson Park Ave.) * Retaining walls (polyline) * Rivers * Roads, incl: road names * Railroads (poly) * Ruins (poly) * Sports (poly) (feature of athletic fields and sports complexes) * Streams (polyline) * Sports lines (outlines of tennis and basketball courts and some fields) * Swamps (poly) * Steps (shp) * Trails (shp) * Trees (polygon) * Unpaved parking * Facilities (UVA buildings) * Road centerlines * Walks (sidewalks and paths) (poly) * Walls * Contour Lines and Spot Elevations
* // * ISO Thematic Topics Categories include: boundaries, environment, location, planning Cadastre, structure and transportation. * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
